participant_1.background:
I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect.
I could brag about my ability to endure physical pain and my endless curiosity about the world.
I went to Comic Con this weekend and had a blast!
i have a bad habit of being dishonest.
i do not like coffee.

participant_2.background:
I'm close with my parents, but they don't understand my music taste.
I like to cook for my family and friends because it allows me to relax and be creative.
i m a hopeless romantic.
I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables.
I'm not rich, but I'm content with my life and I love spending time with my dog.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing pretty well. I just got back from Comic Con this weekend and had a blast.
That sounds awesome! I've never been to Comic Con before, but I've always wanted to go.
It was definitely a lot of fun. I got to meet some of my favorite comic book artists and writers, and I even got to dress up as my favorite superhero.
That sounds so cool! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook for my family and friends. It allows me to relax and be creative.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. I'm not a very good baker, but I can cook anything that involves pasta.
Pasta is delicious! I love making pasta too.
It's so good! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to read. I'm a hopeless romantic, so I love to read romance novels.
I love to read too! I love all kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction.
That's awesome! I love historical fiction too. What's your favorite historical novel?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a great series.
I'm glad we have something else in common.
Me too! I think we could be friends.
I think so too
